headline: 10 Brilliant Growth Stocks to Buy Now and Hold for the Long Term
summary: Electric vehicles, next-generation data centers, semiconductors, digital technology, and machine vision are just a few of the investment themes explored.  All these stocks have powerful underlying secular growth drivers.  Not all of the growth stocks featured here will likely deliver outsize returns, so it makes sense to spread portfolio risk around a collection of holdings.
